name: Bug Bash
description: Get ready to unleash your inner exterminator in Bug Bash! In this thrilling and interactive game, players wield a virtual flipflop to squash pesky bugs as they scuttle across the screen. With each squashed bug, you'll earn points and face even more challenging critters. Fast-paced and full of fun, Bug Bash offers endless entertainment for all ages. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a way to pass the time, Bug Bash will have you hooked from the first smash. Join the action now, and see how many bugs you can bash!
